title: AssetDump v2 Index: Assets By Class
description: Secondary index listing AssetPK references grouped by classKey. Enables fast type-based asset queries without scanning all asset records. Assets are sorted by collectionId then pathId for deterministic ordering.

domain.description: Domain identifier for by_class index records

classKey.description: Dense class key referencing types.schema.json. Maps to TypeDictionaryEntry.classKey. This is NOT the Unity ClassID directly - use classId field for that.

assets.description: Array of asset primary keys (collectionId + pathId) for all assets of this type. Sorted by collectionId then pathId for deterministic ordering and efficient lookups.

count.description: Number of assets of this type. MUST equal assets.length. Provided for fast statistics without loading the entire assets array.

className.description: Unity type name for human readability (e.g., 'GameObject', 'MonoBehaviour', 'Transform'). Source: IUnityObjectBase.ClassName or generated as 'ClassID_{classId}' for unknown types.

classId.description: Unity ClassID for reference and external tool integration (e.g., 1=GameObject, 4=Transform, 114=MonoBehaviour). Source: IUnityObjectBase.ClassID
